name: Metro Dash
description:
A small randomised time-waster that's easy to get absorbed by, driving around your city as a taxi taking requests. Earn more money the faster you complete a trip and buy upgrades and new songs to listen to, for faster trips and better fares.

Press Space to start/stop, and arrow keys/WASD to turn. Press escape for the upgrades menu.

A huge thanks to Fesliyan Studios for all of the free music - please check them out!

I made this to get used to random generation, so it may not be particularly fleshed out, but I wanted to share it anyway. Please enjoy!
